

{% extends "base.html" %} 
{% block title %}Voice Recorder{% endblock %} 
{% block head %}
  <h1 style="text-align: center; margin: 0; padding-top: 2px;">
    <i class="material-icons" style="padding: 10px;">record_voice_over</i>Speak to Remember
    <i class="material-icons" style="padding: 10px; transform: scaleX(-1);">record_voice_over</i>
  </h1>
{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
  <div class="forms-style">
    <p id="recording-time" style="text-align:center; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 40px;">00:00</p>
    <button id="start-recording" style="background: none; border: none; padding-right: 10px;">
      <i class="material-icons" style=" font-size: 40px;">fiber_manual_record</i>
    </button>
    <button id="stop-recording" disabled style="background: none; border: none; padding-right: 10px">
      <i class="material-icons" style=" font-size: 40px;">pause_circle_filled</i>
    </button>
  </div>

  <!-- Add this to your Voice.html file -->
  <h2 align="center">Voice Notes</h2>
  <table style="border: 1px solid black;" align="center">
    <tr>
      <th>Name</th>
    </tr>
    {% for recording in recordings  %}
    <tr style="background-color: aqua;">
      <td>{{ recording.data }}</td>
    </tr>
    {% endfor %}
  </table>
{% endblock %}






{% extends "base.html" %} 
{% block title %}Voice Recorder{% endblock %} 
{% block content %}
    <h1>Voice Recorder</h1>
    <button id="start-recording">Start Recording</button>
    <button id="stop-recording">Stop Recording</button>
    <button id="save-recording">Save Recording</button>
    <audio controls id="audio-player"></audio>
    
    <script src="{{ url_for('static', filename='script.js') }}"></script>
{% endblock %}
